title: Gentler Streak for Apple Watch now tracks dog walking and other non-conventional workouts
content:
Gentler Streak, the Apple Watch workout app that wants to bring compassion to your fitness goals, is being updated to version 2.2. With that, there are some overall improvements, new workouts available, and nice tweaks for both iPhone and Watch apps.

moreâ€¦

The post Gentler Streak for Apple Watch now tracks dog walking and other non-conventional workouts appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Gentler Streak, the Apple Watch workout app now features over 100 workouts, some overall improvements, and more with new update.
